name: RRRRRR
description:
First of all, this game is a love letter to VVVVVV which is a 2010 puzzle-platform game.

RRRRRR = Rotate Rotate Rotate Rotate Rotate Rotate

Keyboard Move  left/right arrow Shoot  Spacebar

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Art:

The asset pack used in this project:

https://ansimuz.itch.io/grotto-escape-ii-art-pack

https://ansimuz.itch.io/grotto-escape-game-art-pack

https://ansimuz.itch.io/grotto-escape-chibi-monsters

I want to give a shout-out to ansimuz for creating those amazing pixel art.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Deconstruction of game:

I am always interested in sharing and discussing the technical details with the community by providing a deconstruction view of the whole project.

Leave comments below if you want to know the implementation details of any game mechanics and features.

If you want to know how to make this game, stay tuned for my blogs releasing soon.
